Document: ## Ingredients -Universal Enzyme = Grind Bungofruit or Juice Corn -Flour = Grind Wheat -Cornmeal = Grind Corn -Rice = Grind Rice Bushel -Sugar = Grind Sugar Cane -Milk = Milk Cow -Soy Milk = Grind Soybeans -Oat Milk = Juice Oats Bushel -Goat Milk = Milk Goat -Salt = Mix 1u Chlorine + 1u Sodium -Vinegar = Mix 1u Ethanol + 1u oxygen -Corn Oil = Juice Corn -Eggs = Laid by Chicken or Duck , "Egg-plants" -Tofu = Mix 30u Soy Milk + 5u Universal Enzyme (Catalyst) -Lime Juice = Juice Lime -Cocoa Powder = Grind Cocoa Pod -Oats = Grind Oats Bushel
